      • executeOperation

        public void executeOperation(int operation,
                             double[] CPIptge,
                             double[] CPIfi,
                             double[] CPIti,
                             double[] CPIei,
                             double[] CPIhi,
                             double[] CPIpsi)
        Name:executeOperation
        This method is used to define the function of each option Pre:The options have been initialized
        Post:One of the options has been chosen
        Parameters:
        operation - int. Variable with option number. operation !=""
        CPIptge[] - double. Variable with the percentage of the CPI for each year. CPIptge[]!=null
        CPIfi[] - double. variable with the percentage of food items of each year. CPIfi[]!=null
        CPIti[] - double. variable with the percentage of transportation items each year. CPIti[]!=null
        CPIei[] - double. variable with the percentage of education items for each year. CPIei[]!=null
        CPIhi[] - double. variable with the percentage of health items each year. CPIhi[]!=null
        CPIpsi[] - double. variable with the percentage of the items of public services of each year. CPIpsi[]!=null

        Name:highest

        Post:The values have been organized
        Parameters:

        b[] - double. This variable has the values of each item (transportation item). b[]!=null

        d[] - double. This variable has the values of each item (health item). d[]!=null
        e[] - double. This variable has the values of each item (public services item). e[]!=null
        f - int. this variable has the numerical position of each item. f!=""
        Returns:
        Number the numerical value of one of the items

      • projectionIPC

        public static double projectionIPC(double[] a,
                                   int b,
                                   int c)
        Name:projectionIPC
        This method is used to find the projection of the CPI for 2021 Pre:The numbers are in the array
        Post:The projection of the CPI has been calculated
        Parameters:
        a[] - double. This variable contains the percentages of the CPI for each year or items. a[]!=null
        b - int. this variable can have the choice of GDP intervals. b!=""
        c - int. This variable can have the numbers 1 and -1 to define the positive and negative part. c!=0
        Returns:
        Higher the largest number in the array
